title: one tikv is isolated from others tikv, and services are unavailable during a failure
body:

8c„ÄÅ16G

### Steps to reproduce
inject one tikv isolated from others tikv last for 10m
[cmd="go-tpc tpcc run -D tpcc10000 --host tc-tidb.glh-master-htap-xxw5g -P4000 --warehouses 10000 -T 8 --time 36000m --ignore-error '2013,1213,1105,1205,8022,8028,9004,9007,1062' --password ''"] [nodename=benchtoolset]

### What did you expect?
qps can recover in 2mins

### What did happened?
one tikv is isolated from others tikv, and services are unavailable during a failure
